scripts.test: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && DATABASE_URL="$TEST_DATABASE_URL" bunx prisma migrate deploy && cd ../../ && DATABASE_URL="$TEST_DATABASE_URL" turbo run test --continue'
scripts.db:studio: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && bunx prisma studio'
scripts.db:generate: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && bunx prisma generate'
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && bunx prisma migrate dev --skip-generate'
scripts.db:reset: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && bunx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-generate'
scripts.test:integration: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && DATABASE_URL="$TEST_DATABASE_URL" bunx prisma migrate deploy && cd ../../apps/server-node && DATABASE_URL="$TEST_DATABASE_URL" bun test src/__tests__/integration'
scripts.arch:deps: turbo run dep:cycles && turbo run dep:orphans
